snippet: A college in southern New Jersey has announced plans to buy the shuttered Showboat Atlantic City casino resort from Caesars Entertainment Corp and turn the property into a branch campus....

headline.print_headline: New Jersey College Buys Atlantic City's Closed Showboat Casino
headline.main: New Jersey College Buys Atlantic City's Closed Showboat Casino

lead_paragraph: A college in southern New Jersey has announced plans to buy the shuttered Showboat Atlantic City casino resort from Caesars Entertainment Corp and turn the property into a branch campus.
